content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the Reagan administration’s approach to communism?

choices.label: Containing its spread by building a new system of international alliances
Engaging in military interventions in Southeast Asia to prevent coups of governments
Pursuing a policy of détente or mutual coexistence with the Soviet Union and China
Using a buildup of nuclear and conventional weapons to create pressure on the Soviet Union
